skill.name: finishing-a-development-branch
skill.description: Use when implementation is complete, all tests pass, and you need to decide how to integrate the work - guides completion of development work by presenting structured options for merge, PR, or cleanup
skill.summary: Use when implementation is complete, all tests pass, and you need to decide how to integrate the wor...
skill.author: DYAI2025

security_audit.summary: This skill provides a structured workflow for completing development branches. It only executes standard git commands and test runners. No network calls, file access outside git operations, or suspicious patterns detected. The skill follows security best practices with confirmation prompts for destructive operations.

content.value_statement: Developers waste time deciding how to finish branches. This skill presents clear options and handles the chosen workflow safely.
actual_capabilities: Verify tests pass before allowing branch completion
Present 4 structured options: merge, PR, keep, or discard
Execute git commands safely with proper error handling
Clean up worktrees after successful completion
limitations: Requires git repository with working test suite
Requires GitHub CLI for PR creation

use_cases.title: Complete feature branches
use_cases.description: Safely merge completed features back to main after verifying all tests pass.

use_cases.title: Create pull requests
use_cases.description: Push branches and create PRs with proper summaries and test plans.

use_cases.title: Clean up worktrees
use_cases.description: Remove temporary worktrees and branches after feature completion.

prompt_templates.title: Complete my branch
prompt_templates.prompt: I've finished implementing the feature. Please use the finishing-a-development-branch skill to complete this work.

prompt_templates.title: Merge after tests pass
prompt_templates.prompt: Tests pass. Help me merge this branch back to main safely.

prompt_templates.title: Create PR for review
prompt_templates.prompt: Push this branch and create a pull request for team review.

prompt_templates.title: Clean up old branch
prompt_templates.prompt: This branch is obsolete. Safely discard it and clean up.

best_practices: Always verify tests pass before offering completion options
Present exactly 4 options without additional explanation
Require typed 'discard' confirmation before deleting work
anti_patterns: Don't ask open-ended questions about next steps
Don't automatically clean up worktrees for PR or keep options

faq.question: What happens if tests fail?
faq.answer: The skill stops immediately and shows test failures. You must fix tests before proceeding.

faq.question: Can I customize the merge options?
faq.answer: No, the skill presents 4 standard options to ensure consistency and safety.

faq.question: Does this work with GitHub alternatives?
faq.answer: PR creation requires GitHub CLI. Other options work with any git repository.

faq.question: Is my code safe during this process?
faq.answer: Yes, the skill requires confirmation for destructive operations and verifies each step.

faq.question: What if I'm not in a git worktree?
faq.answer: The skill works normally. Worktree cleanup only occurs if a worktree exists.

faq.question: How is this different from manual git commands?
faq.answer: It enforces best practices: test verification, structured options, and safe cleanup.
